description: Dark chocolate bark with dried strawberries and nuts, this surprisingly easy dessert is perfect to serve to guests or gift to family and friends.
name: Super-Easy Choc-Strawberry Bark Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle with nuts and strawberry crisps. Refrigerate for 15 minutes or until set. Break into large shards. Serve.
